mapper.insert: insert into pocket_plan( plan_num, user_id, plan_title, plan_sdate, plan_edate, plan_content, plan_achv, plan_allDay )values( pocket_plan_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{plan_title}, #{plan_sdate}, #{plan_edate}, #{plan_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plan_achv}, #{plan_allDay} )
mapper.select: select plan_num, user_id, plan_title, plan_achv, plan_content, plan_sdate, plan_edate, plan_allDay, plan_color from pocket_plan where user_id = #{user_id} order by plan_num

select plan_num, user_id, plan_title, plan_achv, plan_content, plan_sdate, plan_edate, plan_allDay from pocket_plan where user_id = #{user_id} and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') between substr(plan_sdate,1,10) and substr(plan_edate,1,10) or plan_sdate like to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd%') or plan_edate like to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd%'))
order by plan_num
